trackerView.locationLoading: Getting your location, please wait a moment...
trackerView.locationError: Fail to locate your device. Please try again later
trackerView.gpsWarning: Using network location. Not real-time and may be inaccurate. Please enable GPS for real-time location.
trackerView.uiRouteCheckoutTip: New Route added! Click Here to check it out

aboutView.description: Enabling route planning and navigation for outdoor activities with map marking feature. Create tracks by tracing real-time motion. The created tracks can be shared with your friends and uploaded to DNE social platform.
aboutView.creditIntro: Without the following (open source) projects, Trackmaker could not be built:
aboutView.mapInaccuracyDeclaration: Please note that the map data provided may **contain inaccuracies or controversial content**, particularly regarding territorial boundaries. Due to **resource limitations**, we are currently unable to use higher-quality data, but we are actively **seeking better sources** and will update the application as soon as feasible.
